Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) can fancy lump crabmeat, well drained and picked through for cartilage

Ingredients.3: 1 cup Dannon Oikos Plain Greek Nonfat Yogurt

Ingredients.4: 0.25 cup finely chopped red bell pepper

Ingredients.6: 1 teaspoon finely grated zest of one lemon

Ingredients.8: 1 cup plain or panko breadcrumbs, divided

Directions.1: Mix together crabmeat, egg, 1/3 cup yogurt, red pepper, green onion, lemon zest fresh cracked pepper, and 1/2 cup breadcrumbs.

Directions.2: Form mini crab cakes using a tablespoon or small ice cream scoop, and coat the crab cakes in remaining breadcrumbs, placing them onto a parchment lined baking sheet. Spray lightly with cooking spray.

Directions.3: Bake in a 400 degrees F preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until lightly golden.

Directions.4: Mix remaining yogurt, lemon juice, chopped parsley and basil. Season with cracked black pepper. Serve sauce with crab cakes.
